title: Founders pitch to PM Modi at Startup India event
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi met select startup founders at National Startup Day in New Delhi. Entrepreneurs showcased innovations across agritech, cleantech, AI and recruitment. Modi stressed that leadership in artificial intelligence and manufacturing will define India’s economic strength and urged startups to focus on building physical, scalable solutions.

title: From pilots to deployment: OpenAI’s nonprofit push targets AI scale in India
description: With its four-city nonprofit workshop tour, OpenAI aims to accelerate the integration of artificial intelligence into India’s social sector.
content: For Misra, the tour addresses a dissonance she has observed since joining the company in April 2024. “I have seen, whenever we have had interactions with nonprofits, it is the same set of people that show up,” Misra said. “They are really leaning int... [5457 chars]

title: Are AI chatbots risky companions for humans?
description: What does the trend in using artificial intelligence for companionship and romantic love mean for human society?
content: “Alexa, will you marry me?” When Amazon founder Jeff Bezos reported in 2016 that over 250,000 people had proposed to their Alexa devices, commentators laughed it off. But by 2026, people have said, “I do,” to avatars, chatbots and robots in ceremonie... [4998 chars]

title: Philippines blocks Elon Musk’s Grok AI
description: The Philippines has blocked access to Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence chatbot website Grok, citing concerns over sexualised images generated by the AI system. The government is calling out...
content:

title: Dr. Ziyang Jiang: Knowledge-Infused AI Pioneer Bridges Environmental Science and Healthcare for a Sustainable Future
description: In an era where artificial intelligence is not just a tool but a transformative force for global challenges, Dr. Ziyang Jiang stands at the forefront of a quiet revolution. title: India's Big Tech Governance, Unchecked Tech Optimism Alarm Policy Advisors India's Big Tech Governance, Unchecked Tech Optimism Alarm Policy Advisors
description: Policy advisors and civil society groups accuse Big Tech of serving corporate interests with a hawkish AI push. Big Tech has been openly and aggressively pushing countries to adopt artificial intelligence. In India alone, Microsoft has commited $17.5 billion to develop AI infrastructure over the next four years, while Amazon has one-upped the software giant with a $35-billion pledge for AI-driven digitisation and cloud infrastructure.

title: Countries leading the AI race will have an advantage: PM Modi at Startup India event
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Thursday said that the nation leading the artificial intelligence (AI) race will hold a decisive global advantage, and urged Indian startups to drive this to ensure the country’s economic security and autonomy.

title: Proposed Spanish law takes aim at AI deepfakes
description: Spain has approved a draft law aimed at tackling the growing misuse of artificial intelligence
content:
Spain has approved a draft law aimed at tackling the growing misuse of artificial intelligence, as concerns rise across Europe about deepfakes, online abuse and the unauthorised use of personal images.
